subject: AI & Agents
title: Non-Maximum Suppression: Removing Duplicates
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Non-Maximum Suppression: Removing Duplicates.

hook.text: The detector finds the same cat 15 times. You only need one box.

buildup.text: Detectors generate many overlapping proposals for the same object.

discovery.text: NMS keeps the highest-confidence box and removes all boxes with high IoU overlap.

twist.text: In crowded scenes, NMS can accidentally remove valid detections of nearby objects.

climax.text: Soft-NMS reduces scores instead of removing boxes, handling crowded scenes better.

punchline.text: Keep the best. Suppress the rest.
